P

PlayerProfile - Class in highscore
File: PlayerProfile.java Class that holds all pertinent information about a player that has completed a game of Minesweeper This class is used closely with all things relating to the High Score Board.
PlayerProfile(String, int, String) - Constructor for class highscore.PlayerProfile
Three argument constructor A new instance of the PlayerProfile class is created using a String representing the user's name, the int score value they achieived, and a String representation of the mode they were attempting
putNewScore(String, int, String) - Method in class controller.MinesweeperController
Purpose: This method records a new score into the HighScoreBoard class that is stored inside of the Model.
putTurn(int, int) - Method in class controller.MinesweeperController
Purpose: This method processes each player click.
putVal(int, int, int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperBoard
Method that puts the given value into the instance of the MinesweeperBoard
putVal(int, int, int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Purpose: This is a setter for the value of a specific position in the board.
putVisibility(int, int, int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperModel
Purpose: This is a setter that will change the visibility of a specific position on the board.
putVisible(int, int, int) - Method in class model.MinesweeperBoard
Method that puts or updates the visibility status at the (row, col) position of the visible board Method also creates and adds a new OrderedPair object into the visibles ArrayList which stores all the locations on the board that has been revealed to the player
